pages.text: The $(d)Nature Core$() can be found randomly around the world, with a $(3)Nature Chest$() nearby full of goodies.$(br2)The Nature Core itself also does a handful of things every so often.
pages.title: Nature Core

pages.text: It can:$(br)$(li)Convert nearby Sand into Dirt or Grass$(li)Spawn a nearby animal$(li)Bone Meal nearby crops$(li)Plant saplings nearby$(li)Repair the structure around itself
